columns.task_id: The unique identifier for each task.
columns.project_id: The reference identifier for the associated project.
columns.task_details: The textual description of the task to be completed.
columns.eg Agree Objectives: The example used for illustrating task types.

Tasks.table_description: The table tracks tasks associated with specific research projects.

columns.document_type_code: The unique code identifying each document type.
columns.document_description: The detailed explanation of the document type.

Document_Types.table_description: The table categorizes different types of documents used in research grants.

columns.document_id: The unique identifier for each document.
columns.document_type_code: The code classifying the type of document submitted.
columns.grant_id: The reference identifier for the associated grant.
columns.sent_date: The timestamp when the document was sent.
columns.response_received_date: The timestamp when a response to the document was received.
columns.other_details: The additional information related to the document.

Documents.table_description: The table tracks documents submitted for research grants.

columns.grant_id: The unique identifier for each grant.
columns.organisation_id: The reference identifier for the granting organization.
columns.grant_amount: The total monetary value awarded for the grant.
columns.grant_start_date: The date when the grant period begins.
columns.grant_end_date: The date when the grant period concludes.
columns.other_details: The additional information pertinent to the grant.

Grants.table_description: The table manages grants allocated for research purposes.

columns.organisation_type: The unique identifier for each type of organisation.
columns.organisation_type_description: The detailed explanation of the organisation type.

Organisation_Types.table_description: The table categorizes types of organisations involved in research grants.

columns.organisation_id: The unique identifier for each organisation.
columns.organisation_type: The code classifying the type of organisation.
columns.organisation_details: The comprehensive information about the organisation.

Organisations.table_description: The table maintains details about organisations involved in research grants.

columns.project_id: The unique identifier for each project.
columns.outcome_code: The code categorizing the specific project outcome.
columns.outcome_details: The additional information related to the project outcome.

Project_Outcomes.table_description: The table records various outcomes associated with research projects.

columns.staff_id: The unique identifier for each staff member.
columns.project_id: The reference identifier for the associated project.
columns.role_code: The code indicating the specific role assigned to the staff member.
columns.date_from: The start date when the staff member began their role.
columns.date_to: The end date when the staff member's role concluded.
columns.other_details: The additional information pertaining to the staff member's involvement.

Project_Staff.table_description: The table tracks staff involvement in various research projects.

columns.project_id: The unique identifier for each project.
columns.organisation_id: The reference identifier for the organisation funding the project.
columns.project_details: The descriptive information detailing the project's objectives.

Projects.table_description: The table manages details of projects funded by various organisations.

columns.outcome_code: The unique identifier for each research outcome.
columns.outcome_description: The detailed explanation of the research outcome.

Research_Outcomes.table_description: The table categorizes various outcomes of research projects.

columns.staff_id: The unique identifier for each staff member.
columns.employer_organisation_id: The reference identifier for the organisation employing the staff member.
columns.staff_details: The descriptive information about the staff member's role and responsibilities.

Research_Staff.table_description: The table manages details of staff employed for research projects.

columns.role_code: The unique identifier for each staff role.
columns.role_description: The detailed explanation of the staff role.

Staff_Roles.table_description: The table categorizes various roles assigned to research project staff.
